DOC.brief_summary: Rationale : Retrospectively review participant GODDAF database , reveal significant association weight genetic risk score Dupuytren disease recurrence . However , significant dose-response relation find . This might cause underestimating recurrence rate , due retrospective nature determine recurrence . Therefore , want follow-up measurement GODDAF participant , see whether suffered recurrent disease . Objective : We aim determine whether wGRS associate recurrent DD . Study design : An observational study , participant GODDAF study follow . Study population : Patients affect Dupuytren disease , age 18-96 year , previously include another study genetic basis Dupuytren disease . Intervention ( applicable ) : NA Main study parameters/endpoints : The main study parameter presence recurrent Dupuytren disease .
DOC.brief_title: Is wGRS Associated With DD Recurrence ?
